fields.label: VUNetID
fields.name: vunetid
fields.instructions: VUNetIDs are not displayed, but may be used in the future to pull additional information about this person from other campus directories.

choices.Research Support, American Recovery and: Research Support, American Recovery and Reinvestment Act
choices.Research Support, Non-U.S. Govt Research: Research Support, Non-U.S. Govt Research Support, U.S. Govt, Non-P.H.S.

fields.label: Authors
fields.name: authors
fields.instructions: Add as many author as you need.

sub_fields.label: First (Given) Name
sub_fields.name: first_given_name
sub_fields.instructions: Include middle name (or Initial) if desired.

sub_fields.label: Initials
sub_fields.name: initials
sub_fields.instructions: Optionally override the initials for the author's first and middle name.

sub_fields.label: Suffix
sub_fields.name: suffix
sub_fields.instructions: (e.g., 2nd, or 3rd, etc., Jr or Sr) Do not include honorifics (e.g., PhD, MD, etc.)

choices.book_editor: Book Editor (if different from publication editor)

title: Title and Department for Lab Person

fields.label: Book Title
fields.name: book_title
fields.instructions: Only use this field if the publication is a contribution to a book / conference proceedings that is a collection of works by multiple authors.

fields.label: Pagination
fields.name: pagination
fields.instructions: Use NLM pagination format. e.g., "284-7" e.g., "768", or for part of a book, "Chapter 29, Endometriosis; p. 1103-33"

fields.label: Location Published
fields.name: location_published
fields.instructions: Use the city name. For cities in other countries, if the city is not well known or could be confused with another city of the same name, follow the city with the country name, either written in full or as the two-letter ISO country code in parentheses. e.g., "Oxford (England)". If the location is inferred from the location of the University and not stated directly (i.e., for a dissertation) surround the location with brackets. e.g., "[Corvallis (OR)]"

title: Web Address Field for Lab Publication

fields.label: Files
fields.name: files
fields.instructions: Attach relevant files. Use the description field to label the file. For example, you could upload a PDF of the full text and use the description "Full Text".
fields.mime_types: pdf, doc, docx, xls, xlsx, mp4, mov, mp3, jpg, gif, png, rtf

title: Morelink and File CV for Lab Person
Decorative Image Field for Lab Publication

fields.label: Title
fields.name: title
fields.instructions: Enter the conference title, unless the Title given above includes the conference name (e.g., Proceedings of the 10th World Congress on Pain)
